Topic.Title: Room description shows up too soon [Solved]

Posts.EditableText: Hi guys! Bit of a basic question here - I'm trying to put a menu in-between rooms that causes the player to make a decision. As soon as they leave one room the screen is cleared and the question menu shows up. Problem is, as soon as it shows up, the next room's description immediately triggers and fills the screen. How do I make the description wait for a menu item to be clicked first?
